message:
2020-07-24: Preorder closed today until next Friday = double batch next week
10 minutes before preorder scheduled to open, a warehouse staff shared a photo of a potential problem she wanted to double check, we started to second guess, maybe some of marks on parts are  NOT dirt or dust that can be wiped off, but something permanent - PANIC!!!
A flood of photos, group text, insert profanity, how bad? how many? how can this happen again? 9:27AM PST, I announced the bad news.
For those that went out of their way, I wish I can give your time back, but I won't be getting my time back either.
